title: internal compiler error: 'parse_fn_style: bad fn_style i'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Freshly built rust https://github.com/mozilla/rust/commit/40a979775159176f15eb66617a89b9e1a43857f2 fails with:

```
task 'rustc' failed at 'parse_fn_style: bad fn_style i', /private/tmp/rust-zA4W/src/librustc/metadata/tydecode.rs:449
```
